Actions.Text: AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO LOCAL GOVERNMENT

Title: Permits the town of Warwick to use preservation funds for water quality improvement
Summary: Permits the town of Warwick to utilize preservation funds for the implementation of water quality improvement projects.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the town law, in relation to permitting the town of Warwick to utilize preservation funds for the implementation of water quality improvement projects
